statements: SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, current_quantity FROM products
SELECT product_name, current_quantity FROM products WHERE current_quantity > min_stock_level
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT product_name, max_stock_level FROM products WHERE max_stock_level < 50
SELECT * FROM products WHERE current_quantity > min_stock_level
SELECT product_name, current_quantity FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, max_stock_level FROM products WHERE current_quantity < min_stock_level ORDER BY max_stock_level ASC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT product_name, current_quantity FROM products WHERE max_stock_level = 50
SELECT * FROM Inventory
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < min_stock_level
SELECT * FROM StockTransactions
SELECT transaction_date, quantity FROM StockTransactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock > min_stock_level
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, current_stock, max_stock_level FROM Inventory WHERE max_stock_level < current_stock
SELECT * FROM StockTransactions WHERE transaction_type = 'INBOUND' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM StockTransactions GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 100
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock < minimum_stock_level;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock > maximum_stock_level;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity_ordered, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, minimum_stock_level, maximum_stock_level FROM products WHERE minimum_stock_level >= 10 AND maximum_stock_level <= 50 ORDER BY product_id
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity_ordered, order_date FROM orders WHERE quantity_ordered > 10 AND order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC, order_id ASC
SELECT product_id, AVG(stock_level) AS average_stock FROM stock_history GROUP BY product_id HAVING average_stock < 50 ORDER BY average_stock ASC
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT location_name, quantity FROM locations JOIN inventory ON locations.location_id = inventory.location_id;
SELECT product_name, order_date, total_amount FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT location_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM locations JOIN inventory ON locations.location_id = inventory.location_id GROUP BY location_name HAVING SUM(quantity) > 500 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;

SELECT product_name, quantity, location_name FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id JOIN locations ON inventory.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC, location_name;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY total_amount DESC, order_date ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT product_name, price, location_name FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id JOIN locations ON inventory.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC, location_name;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM warehouses WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY capacity ASC, warehouse_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, address, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE LENGTH(address) > 10;
SELECT warehouse_name, address, capacity FROM warehouses WHERE capacity >= 10000 ORDER BY warehouse_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM products WHERE quantity < 50 AND price BETWEEN 20 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, warehouse_id, quantity, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Inbound' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
